description:
By time you have trekked high into the hills to the dark, fortress-like structue, night has properly fallen and the moon holds dominion over the land once more.
The path between the peaks climbs a rocky escarpment, with a precipitous drop on one side and a sheer cliff on the other, until it finally stops in front of the stone-walled entrance to the building, the wall having been built acros a narrow pass between the peaks, so that they have been incorporated into the building.
Beyond the rockface-wall, you can see the pointed gables and squat towers of another structure within the complex.
You are Standing in front of a sturdy, and oak door.
To one side, a tallow-fat lamp flickers within a tiny recess, and on the other side there hangs a knotted piece of rope that you take to be a bell pull.
If you want to spend the night under shelter, you are going to have to gain access to the building, somehow.
